name: @spectree/blender
description: Automated 3D asset creation and scene generation pipeline using Blender. Converts structured prompts into production-grade 3D assets with PBR materials, professional lighting, and multi-format export, with iterative quality refinement. Note: This skill pack is not seeded automatically by the default seedAllSkillPacks script and must be installed via the dedicated Blender pipeline setup or a separate seeding step.

agents.name: bp-orchestrator
agents.description: Entry-point agent that chains all sub-agents and manages the quality refinement loop (max 3 rounds) from prompt to exported 3D assets

agents.name: bp-prompt-interpreter
agents.description: Parses structured or natural-language prompts into a normalized asset specification with geometry, materials, lighting, and camera definitions

agents.name: bp-scene-planner
agents.description: Creates a complete scene graph from the asset spec with object hierarchies, transforms, material assignments, and render configuration

agents.name: bp-asset-generator
agents.description: Generates Blender Python scripts for geometry creation including meshes, curves, modifiers, and sculpting operations

agents.name: bp-material-applicator
agents.description: Creates PBR materials with Principled BSDF shader node trees, UV mappings, and texture assignments

agents.name: bp-lighting-rigger
agents.description: Sets up professional lighting rigs (3-point, HDRI, dramatic) and camera configuration with focal length, DOF, and composition

agents.name: bp-quality-inspector
agents.description: Renders previews and evaluates scene quality against standards for geometry, materials, lighting, and composition with scored pass/fail

agents.name: bp-export-manager
agents.description: Exports final assets in production formats (glTF, FBX, USD, OBJ) with optimized settings and produces an export manifest

skills.name: blender-pipeline-process
skills.description: 3-phase pipeline process from structured prompt to exported 3D assets with iterative quality refinement

instructions.name: blender-config
instructions.description: Project configuration including Blender path, render engine, output directory, resolution, and quality thresholds

dependencies.blender: Requires Blender 3.6+ installed and accessible via command line for Python script execution
